item.title: How do i find 2 handed weapons for godswords in client.java
item.dc:creator: @silabmods silabmods
item.description:
@silabmods wrote:

well this is wa you need to do, if you already have a gs will be easyer

first step adding the way you want to attack

search for a item id and if you find something like this is good if not add this too …

    public int GetWepAnim() {

and

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15333 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15334 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15335 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15336) // godsword { return 407; }
^all my gs^

search for ( or add )

    public int GetWalkAnim(int id) {

then add

if (id == 15334 || id == 15336 || id == 15333 || id == 15335 ) // Godsword { return 1663; }

then search for this ( or add )

    public int GetStandAnim(int id) {

and add this too

if (id == 15334 || id == 15336 || id == 15335 || id == 15333 ) // maul { return 1662; }

This is all … i think … but you can change they way you hold it, hit , and walk with a gs or any other wep

Read full topic
